    Road and traffic Sign Test

    Pass the theory test

    This course has everything you need to pass your driving theory test first time. Includes licensed DVSA content.
    All Courses

    Frequently Asked Questions

    • Yes, you can take a driver theory test while disqualified from driving in the UK, as you don’t need a learner permit or driving license to do so. However, you can only take the theory test for the AM or BW categories while disqualified.

    • There are five separate Driver Theory Test categories

    • The UK has around 380 driving test centers, most of which are full-time but some of which are part-time. Each center has its own test routes that are planned by examiners based on the local area. Test routes can vary significantly depending on the location, with city routes often being more difficult due to busier roads

    • It is possible to reschedule or cancel your booking free of charge provided the request is made 5 full working days before the day of your Test and not including the day you reschedule.
